documentation.text:
@title Vester
 @notice Support vesting esPIKA to PIKA token. A high fee is attached for short term claimer and the fee decreases linearly to reward long term claimer.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct Vester.UserInfo storage ref))

documentation.text: @notice Withdraw the deposited esPIKA. The vesting is reset for the withdrawn amount.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claim(uint256).notice: Claim PIKA token from vesting. If the vesting is not completed, it is attached a fee, which decreases linearly to 0 at the vesting completion time. The deposited esPIKA token is burned and the fee is transferred to the treasury.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw the deposited esPIKA. The vesting is reset for the withdrawn amount.

userdoc.notice: Support vesting esPIKA to PIKA token. A high fee is attached for short term claimer and the fee decreases linearly to reward long term claimer.
